Sergio Marchionne has said the workers deserve bonuses even though the company lost money because of work they did in revamping or redesigning 16 models since the 2009 bankruptcy. George W. Bush administration, Donald Rumsfeld was at odds with Secretary of State Colin Powell about Iraq. The differences weren't personal, Donald Rumsfeld says. He recalls receiving a book that Henry Kissinger had written, with the inscription, To an occasional adversary and a permanent friend. Working on the book meant second-guessing his memory.
